The Philosophers sword.name: The Philosophers sword
The Philosophers sword.description: A powerful sword that was wielded by a great king from the kingdom of Rohan. This sword will deal damage of -15hp to any monster that comes across it.

The Queen’s Jewel.name: The Queen’s Jewel
The Queen’s Jewel.description: A rare gemstone from a dynasty of royalty. Putting this ring on will regenerate a player’s HP% Faster.

Sharks tooth.name: Sharks tooth
Sharks tooth.description: A tooth from the notorious megalodon. Equipping this gives a 10% boost to players damage

Ancient vase.name: Ancient vase
Ancient vase.description: King Tut’s favorite vase. It is rumored that whoever possesses it is doomed for eternity. Lowers players defense by 10% if equipped

Crystal skull.name: Crystal skull
Crystal skull.description: A crystal skull that was taken by Indiana Jones himself.

Aegis Shield.name: Aegis Shield
Aegis Shield.description: A magical shield that was once carried by the Greek god Zeus.

Ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.description: A God-Slaying Divine sword fused from rage of the gods, capable of mass destruction. Equipping this sword allows the player to do -30 damage to an enemy.

Broken Sword and Shield.name: Broken Sword and Shield
Broken Sword and Shield.description: A broken and rusted pair of armory, it looks like it belongs to the statue nearby.

Key.name: Key
Key.description: A key that fits many keyholes, but only unlocks one.

Hourglass.name: Hourglass
Hourglass.description: A large hourglass with time slowly ticking.

Dynamite.name: Dynamite
Dynamite.description: A large explosive that can be used to tear down large walls.
